projects.title: Abugida
projects.description: Created my own interpreted programming language using Python.
features: Basic data types like numbers, strings and lists.
Control flow statements like if-else, for and while loops.
Built-in functions like print, input, len, etc.

projects.title: Smart Garage
projects.description: A mobile app making use of IoT cloud platforms to enable authorized users to control their Smart garage and Delivery box remotely using their smart phone.
features: Enable users to get notified if their garage/delivery box is left open for long time.
Enable users to set auto-close mode to be engaged after a specific time.
